items.sentence: Tom fell asleep while driving and caused an accident.
Tom fell in love with Mary the first time he met her.
Tom fell in love with Mary the first time he saw her.
Tom is not as good a chess player as he thinks he is.
Tom is old enough to know that what he did was wrong.
Tom is one of the three men that came here yesterday.
Tom hasn\'t been to Boston as many times as Mary has.
Tom hasn\'t changed his mind and probably never will.
I don\'t suppose you know anything about Tom, do you?
I don\'t think I ever knew what Tom did for a living.
